name: EURO Truck Driving Simulator
description: Enjoy this Extreme truck driving and real life truck driving games. After playiong this lorry driving game you will feel that this truck delivery game is full of crazy and joyness. This truck will jam your mission if you can't have controle over breaking and gearing system of the grand truck. Avoid monster truck crashes and fell the thrill of this truck adventure. From all the mountain monster games drive this monster truck legends game and have a experience of truck trials driving and enjoy this crazy monsters gametruck.
